thread.title: Kara

author: Kara
title: Kara
text: Really quick and easy to find my tyres online and book a convenient date and time at my work address. I had an email on the day of my appt giving me a more specific time as I had picked an all day slot. I then received a polite, friendly phone call from Chris who said he'd be 20 minutes. He actually got to my work before I did! But was very nice and understating of the traffic. He explained what he would be doing and how long it would take. He then called me to say he had finished and talked me through what he had done. Very pleased with the service and will recommend Tyres On The Drive to everyone! Thank you.
